mapper.select: SELECT platform,system,job,server_name,job_type,last_status,job_date ,last_script_name,timewindow,virtual_enable,check_frequency,check_time_trigger,check_weight, batch,priority,num_times,pending_time,dispatcher_time,start_time,end_time ,call_again_max_num,call_again_num,location,check_file_stream,ignore_error FROM uds_job WHERE job IN (SELECT stm_job FROM uds_job_stream WHERE platform=#{platform} AND system=#{system} AND job=#{job} AND is_enable = 1) AND is_enable=1;

SELECT platform,system,job,server_name,job_type,last_status,job_date ,last_script_name,timewindow,virtual_enable,check_frequency,check_time_trigger,check_weight, batch,priority,num_times,pending_time,dispatcher_time,start_time,end_time ,call_again_max_num,call_again_num,location,check_file_stream,ignore_error FROM uds_job WHERE job IN (SELECT dep_job FROM uds_job_dependency WHERE platform=#{platform} AND system=#{system} AND job=#{job} AND is_enable = 1) AND is_enable=1;

SELECT A.id,A.platform,A.system,A.job,A.start_time,A.end_time,A.second,A.minute,A.hour,A.day, A.month, A.week, A.year,A.offset_day,B.last_status,B.job_date,B.job_type,B.batch,B.check_file_stream FROM uds_job_date_trigger A,uds_job B WHERE A.job=B.job AND A.is_enable=1 AND B.is_enable=1 AND B.job_type='C' AND NOW()>A.start_time AND A.end_time> NOW() AND B.check_time_trigger=1;

SELECT A.id,A.platform,A.system,A.job,A.start_time,A.end_time,A.second,A.minute,A.hour,A.day, A.month, A.week, A.year,A.offset_day,B.last_status,B.job_date,B.job_type,B.batch,B.check_file_stream FROM uds_job_date_trigger A,uds_job B WHERE A.job=B.job AND A.is_enable=1 AND B.is_enable=1 AND B.job_type='C' AND NOW()>A.start_time AND A.end_time> NOW() AND B.check_time_trigger=1 AND #{location}&B.location>0;
select MIN(date_sub(start_time,interval offset_day day)) start_time FROM uds_job_date_trigger WHERE platform=#{platform} AND system=#{system} AND job=#{job} AND is_enable = 1;

select id,platform ,system,job,start_time,end_time,offset_day, second,minute,hour,day,month,week,year FROM uds_job_date_trigger WHERE platform=#{platform} AND system=#{system} AND job=#{job} AND is_enable = 1;
SELECT id,platform,system,job,minute,hour,day,month,week,year FROM uds_job_date_frequency WHERE platform=#{platform} AND system=#{system} AND job=#{job} AND is_enable = 1;
select platform,system,max_run_job,strategy,strategy_pro,use_platform from uds_system WHERE platform=#{platform} AND system=#{system};
mapper.update: UPDATE uds_system SET max_run_job=#{max_run_job},strategy=#{strategy},use_platform=#{use_platform},strategy_pro=#{strategy_pro} WHERE platform=#{platform} AND system=#{system};
